oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Photograph of James Johnston and military unit
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: This photograph shows James Johnston and his military unit in training camp. The men are wearing leggings and campaign hats, which indicates they are at training camp. A notation on the reverse identifies Johnson on the top row, far right. Pvt. James McFerren Johnston served in HQ Co., Ord. Corps, attached to the 114th MG Battn., 30th Div. The 30th Div. consisted of National Guard units from Tennessee and North and South Carolina. Their nickname was the "Old Hickory" Division.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Johnston, James McFerren
